title: Potential therapeutic target for amyotrophic lateral sclerosis

title_detail.value: Potential therapeutic target for amyotrophic lateral sclerosis

summary: New research has revealed that the protein TDP-43 regulates a gene called Stathmin2 (STMN2). STMN2 shows promise as a therapeutic target and could be the first biomarker ALS, which is extremely difficult to diagnose and treat.

summary_detail.value: New research has revealed that the protein TDP-43 regulates a gene called Stathmin2 (STMN2). STMN2 shows promise as a therapeutic target and could be the first biomarker ALS, which is extremely difficult to diagnose and treat.
